trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The harengon's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit (the target gains no benefit from less than total cover), range 320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage. Hit or Miss: Immediately after making this attack, the harengon can use the Hide action.
